snippet: Twelve people were arrested in a plot said to be linked to Al Qaeda to attack the embassy in Ankara and other targets.
abstract: Turkish police say they have found evidence of plot linked to Al Qaeda to bomb United States Embassy in Ankara, synagogue in Istanbul and other targets, from a raid on two terrorist cells in February.
lead_paragraph: Twelve people were arrested in a plot said to be linked to Al Qaeda to attack the embassy in Ankara and other targets.

headline.seo: U.S. Embassy in Turkey Said to Be Bomb Plot Target
headline.main: U.S. Embassy in Turkey Said to Be Targeted
headline.print_headline: U.S. Embassy In Turkey Said To Be Targeted
